definitions.title: n.
definitions.body: [[[מ]]:] portion (of food) for king, delicacies (Pers. loanword, cf. Skr. prati-bhâga, Zend [pati-baga; whence] Gk. translit. poti/-baziv, Syr.pat.boge0; Gilden ZKM iv. 213 f. Lag Ges. Abh.73 Bev:Dn Dr:Dn);—cstr. [[פַּת־בַּג הַמֶּלֶח]] Da 1:5, Da 1:8, Da 1:13, Da 1:15, sf. [[פַּת־בָּגׇם]] v:Da 1:16, [[אׂכְלֵי]] [[פַת־בָּגוֹ]] Da 11:26.
